data.actual_result: No image appears. When you click on the Mutual servers tab when no mutual servers have loaded, the "No servers in common" image and text appear but neither of them appear for Common friends.
data.short_description: User's profiles with whom you share no common friends, seen when Discord is connecting, shows no icon/image in common friends.
data.steps_to_repro: - Close Discord. - Turn off internet ( Or open Discord and when it's connecting, turn off internet.) - Open Discord. - Click on a profile. ( If nothing loads, try going to a profile through DM.) - Click on the common friends tab.
